name.ja: <ruby>環<rt>かん</rt></ruby><ruby>幻<rt>げん</rt></ruby><ruby>楽<rt>がっ</rt></ruby><ruby>姫<rt>き</rt></ruby>アクションメロディ

requirement.en: Place 1 Spell Card from your Graveyard on either the top or bottom of the Deck.

effect.en: 1 face-up monster on your opponent's field loses 2000 ATK/DEF until the end of your opponent's next turn. Then, if you placed "Straight Pierce" or "Fusion" to meet the requirement, you can draw 1 card.

materials.en: "Tubardiche the Music Princess" + "Boton the Music Princess"
